Token.Abstract: Allows Virtuoso to request the enclosing application for asset specific DRM values when requesting CastLabs (DrmToday) FairPlay license keys.
Called when the DRM subsystem needs a DRM configuration to make a licensing request.

Parameter.Name: asset
Parameter.Abstract: The VirtuosoAsset object that will request a FairPlay license.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A properly configured CastLabsDrmConfig object containing proper licensing details for the asset.
